email_body: Dexter, Hopefully Griff Gray has sent you the information on your id and password by now. It should be good through January. Please email or call if any problems. Phillip -----Original Message----- From: Dexter Steis Sent: Wednesday, July 25, 2001 6:24 PM To: Allen, Phillip K. Subject: Re: NGI access to eol Phillip, If its not to much trouble, could you have my guest username and password reinstated. Thanks, Dexter JOR46762 WELCOME!
